author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.4.2 - Improve child device initialization logic: Fixed initialize() method to only initialize individual presence child devices while properly skipping Anyone Motion sensor device. This prevents unnecessary initialization of the aggregated motion sensor component.
